definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Essentially, that's what Wimsatt says in the footnote.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这就是Wimsatt脚注里所说的。

sentences.english: Put details and digressions in footnotes. Then delete the footnotes.
sentences.chinese: 把细节和离题的东西放到脚注，然后删除脚注。

sentences.english: Put details and digressions in footnotes. Then delete the footnotes.
sentences.chinese: 把细节和离题的东西放到脚注，然后删除脚注。

sentences.english: That's the introduction to the footnotes.
The asterisk refers the reader to a footnote.
sentences.chinese: 星号指引读者去查阅脚注。

sentences.english: Such references should usually be provided in footnotes.
Gibbon of course was said to have lived his life in his footnotes.
sentences.chinese: 当然，据说吉本的一生都花在自己的脚注上。

sentences.english: Perhaps I live my life in the footnotes of other people.
sentences.chinese: 或许我的一生都花在别人的脚注上。

sentences.english: I have not yet footnoted my dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 我还没有给我的论文加上脚注。

sentences.english: Type the footnote or endnote content in this area.
sentences.chinese: 在这一区域键入脚注或尾注的内容。

sentences.english: The asterisk refers to a footnote.
Footnotes or endnotes must start at 1 if numbering is not continuous.
sentences.chinese: 如果编号不连续，则脚注或尾注必须从1开始。

sentences.english: The separator line is drawn directly above the frame for the footnotes.
sentences.chinese: 分隔线直接绘制在脚注框架的上方。

sentences.english: Where more than one citation is given in a single footnote, separate them with semi-colons.
sentences.chinese: 在一个脚注中多于一个引证，用分号隔开。

sentences.english: Often times the footnotes may dictate the design of the diaphragm.
sentences.chinese: 很多时候脚注决定了横隔的设计。

definition: marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)
Chinese guillemet 《》(punct. used for names of books etc)
